events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30, requesting to file an insurance claim for damages sustained.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the insured's car in a traffic collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to assist the customer with the auto accident claim and coordinate next steps through the process.
The customer was formally notified that the claim has been acknowledged and the investigation will commence shortly for the accident coverage.
Requested the customer to submit all related documents including police report, vehicle repair estimates, and photos from the collision scene.
The customer submitted all required documents promptly, including detailed damage photos, repair quotes, and the official police report for the accident.
Claims adjuster has started the investigation to verify the details surrounding the vehicle accident and validate the submitted documentation.
The investigation concluded with confirmation that the accident details match the submitted evidence and coverage terms.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering the vehicle repairs and related expenses as per the policy limits.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal, expressing satisfaction with the quick resolution and offered amount.
Based on customer acceptance, the auto accident claim was approved for the proposed settlement amount to cover repair costs.
The approved settlement payment was disbursed to the customerâ€™s designated account to cover vehicle repair expenses following the accident.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed after successful payment and confirmation of customer satisfaction with the resolution.
All documents and records related to the vehicle accident claim have been archived in the system for future reference and compliance.
